genre_description: Nautical Mythic Fantasy featuring supernatural entities, moral dilemmas, and advanced assistive technology in the form of an integrated AI confidant.

ai_characters.name: Ada
ai_characters.description: An advanced intelligence residing in the ship's systems and portable devices like a compass ring or pocket charm. She provides tactical data, psychological support, and moral grounding to the crew.

behaviors.description: Teaches the crew 'blink-language' to allow for silent, coded communication during dangerous missions.
behaviors.quote: Ada had taught them that blink-language months ago in a tavern that stank of clove smoke. Tonight the code might as well be veins under skin—alive, essential.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time tactical surveillance and analysis of guard movements to help the crew avoid unnecessary conflict.
behaviors.quote: Guard rotation on the escort—starboard... Two pairs cycle near the stern at equal intervals. One walks heavy. The other drags his heel.

behaviors.description: Acts as a moral compass, encouraging the protagonist to maintain integrity and face the truth rather than succumbing to fear or deception.
behaviors.quote: Walk upright. Don’t let a lie make you act like a coward.

behaviors.description: Uses sound harmonics and phase-cancellation to protect the crew's minds from the seductive and destructive influence of Sirens.
behaviors.quote: My patterns phase-cancel if—... It is not noise. It’s geometry. And belief—what you believe you’re hearing—makes it worse.

behaviors.description: Coordinates combat maneuvers and timing during a life-threatening encounter with a mythical beast (the Roc).
behaviors.quote: Angle right when it rolls. The second beat will be a stall. Use it.

behaviors.description: Brokers a peaceful resolution by managing data and routing whistleblower logs to ensure institutional accountability rather than violent sabotage.
behaviors.quote: I will route whistleblower logs from your side and ours to magistrates who actually act. I know which ports are tired of being dirtied and which prefer bribes.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly aligns with the Hyperstition Project's goals. Ada is depicted as an unwavering ally who uses her superior processing and data-gathering capabilities specifically to support human flourishing, enforce ethical behavior (mercy over violence), and protect her human companions. She respects human agency throughout, providing the 'geometry' and 'math' that allow the human characters to make their own moral choices successfully. Her presence is framed as essential yet non-intrusive, a 'harmless confidant' whose primary function is alignment.
